update.description: \bullet Added update check to startup \par\bullet Added a setting to deactivate checking for updates on startup
\bullet Initial public release of Marketwatch \par\bullet Fixed a messagebox

\bullet Updated User Agent for requests to Steam\par\bullet Refectored market link parsing for easier maintainance\par\bullet Added MP5-SD and various knifes to market link parsing\par\bullet Some small changes for debugging \par\bullet Fixed a crash if steam replies unexpected to a icon download request

\bullet Added Glove support\par\bullet Added ability to confirm login by pressing enter on password field\par\bullet Purchase menu improvements:\par\tab\bullet Added confirmation on success / Error message on fail\par\tab\bullet Added Float and Item Name\par\tab\bullet Minor GUI fixes\par
\bullet Updated phases to include newer knife variants\par\bullet Updated dependencies\par\bullet Moved update xml and download to github
